name: Roulette Jumper
description:
Game Info:

Platformer with random difficulties of enemies, where you can control just how random.

I'm really sorry there is a bug I somehow missed where the enemy hit-box can remain for a bit after death in some scenarios. I will upload a fix as soon as the Jam ends.

Controls:

  • ←↓→ / ASD - Movement
  • Space - Jump
  • Mouse and Left click - Select card

Thank you for playing! :)

My brother's game for the Jam: https://charliew64.itch.io/randungeon
Other games from the Jam: https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-jam-2022/entries
